about_the_game:
Surviwall is a single-player survival game.

UNIQUE FIELD

Each time you reach the land, a unique field is created, giving you a different experience each time.

4 WALLS


You're free on the field, but with 4 walls surrounding the terrain, you'll feel trapped as you try to survive. Surviwall creates unique terrains in a limited area and challenges you to survive with limited resources. You must try to solve the mystery of the walls while trying to survive.

MIDFIELD


Depending on your luck, the islands that can appear from the midfield will provide you with an unlimited variety of resources to use and store. You may also have to deal with the invaders that come with the resources, so be prepared for anything! Surviwall aims to give you a different experience every time with its midfield mechanics.

BUILD & CREATE


Build, upgrade and customize structures between 4 walls. New possibilities from the central area offer different building options.The map is randomized each time, but the buildings you build stay with you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: Cpu SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shadermodel 5.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

short_description: Surviwall is a survival and roguelike game. Players struggle to survive while trapped inside the walls. A secret awaits the players inside the walls. With the changing platform, different challenges and surprises await players every time.
supported_languages: English, Turkish, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Russian, Czech
